content.rendered:
Directed by Mohit Suri.

Written by Shagufta Rafique.

Cast Emraan Hashmi(Aarav Ruparel). Vidya Balan(Vasudha). Rajkummar Rao(Hari Prasad (as Raj Kumar Yadav)). Sara Khan(Naila (as Sarah Khan)). Suhasini Mulay(Hari’s mother). Narendra Jha(ACP Patil). Madhurima Tuli(Avni). Amala Akkineni(Rohini) .Mukesh Agrohari.Bhavesh Balchandani.Uday Chandra.Paras Chhabra. Zachary Coffin(Journalist). Namit Das(Saanjh Prasad grown up).Anil George.Vivek Ghamande. Armen Greyg(Body guard (as Armen Grayg)).Manish Raj Gupta.Jagmohan.Yatin Karyekar.Khuahhish.Gaurav Kumar.Bhuperdra Singh Negi. Prabal Panjabi(Apurva). Mukesh Paul((as Mukesh Kumar Pal)).Amit Sharma.Yogesh Shirke.Atul Kumar Shukla.Krishna Srivastava.Gary Tantony.Saurabh Tiwari

Language Hindi.

Producers Aleem Allie. Nizam Allie. Mehboob Bawa. Vikram Bhatt. Noorie Hassan. Sumit Sabharwal.

Production Fox STAR Studios. Vishesh Films.
